summary: This document is email correspondence between FBI personnel regarding obtaining and analyzing Ghislaine Maxwell's credit card records, specifically American Express statements. It includes attachments with financial data and discusses technical issues with account numbers.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Her credit card records are being analyzed by the FBI as part of an investigation.

persons.name: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: Prepared analysis of Maxwell's credit cards from financial productions received.

connections.person2: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office
connections.description: The forensic accountant is analyzing Maxwell's financial records as part of an FBI investigation.

events.title: Initial credit card analysis request
events.description: Request was made for analysis of Maxwell's credit cards from financial productions.
personsInvolved: Forensic Accountant FBI New York Field Office

events.title: Follow-up on credit card records
events.description: Email correspondence discussing technical issues with American Express account numbers and requesting refreshed production.

events.title: Last credit card statement closing date
events.description: Mention of the closing date of Maxwell's last American Express statement.

locations: FBI New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: The FBI was actively analyzing Ghislaine Maxwell's credit card records as of June 2020.
American Express statements were being obtained but had incomplete account numbers, requiring additional verification.
A forensic accountant prepared draft analysis of Maxwell's credit cards for discussion purposes.
The document shows ongoing financial investigation into Maxwell's activities through credit card transaction analysis.
Technical issues were encountered with American Express account numbers (starting with 34 vs expected 37).
